created.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for when this document was first created.

updated.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for when this document was most recently updated.

content.description: The details of the contact card.

isCompany.description: Does this contact represent a company, or an individual? Default false (individual).

addresses.description: Object of addresses and their associated properties.

keys.description: An integer (starting with 1) representing the display order.

tag.description: A tag to correspond to the address, like 'home' or 'work'.

secondary.description: An optional second line for apartment or suite number.

phones.description: Object of phone numbers and their associated properties.

keys.description: An integer (starting with 1) representing the display order.

tag.description: A tag to correspond to the phone number, like 'home' or 'mobile'.

emails.description: Object of email addresses and their associated properties.

keys.description: An integer (starting with 1) representing the display order.

tag.description: A tag to correspond to the email address, like 'personal' or 'work'.

birthday.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for the contact's birthday.

anniversary.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for the contact's anniversary.

meta.description: Additional metadata to provide along with the document.

keys.description: The name of the metadata property.

values.description: The value of the metadata property.
